createToken.step2Desc: Specify the token name, token symbol, token image
createToken.step3Desc: Determine the Supply and Decimals of your Token.
createToken.step4Desc: Add more information about token: website, twitter (X), telegram, discord ... (optional)
createToken.step5Desc: Click on create, accept the transaction on your wallet and wait until your tokens ready.

createSale.step1Desc: Enter the token address and launchpad info
createSale.step2Desc: Let people know who you are

hero.title: The Web3 Crowdfunding platform
hero.content1: Join AntSale in building a future where your online socialgraph is owned and built by you, not companies.
hero.content2: Download the app and start building your own network, powered by Lens Protocol, CyberConnect and dozens of the coolest projects in Web3.

ads.faq1: Press “ Buy Now” above and connect wallet
ads.faq2: Enter amount of SOL to swap for $ANTF
ads.faq3: Hit “Buy Now” again and confirm transaction
ads.fairContent1: If you can’t connect your wallet just send SOL to
ads.fairContent2: and tokens will be airdropped to the sending wallet NB: Don’t use a CEX to send SOL! Use your own wallet
ads.seedDesc: Our goal for the seed sale is to raise a minimum of 200 SOL and a maximum of 1000 SOL. This is a great opportunity to participate in as it is a one-time sale only.
ads.fairlaunchDesc: All SOL raised during the Fairlaunch Sale will be used to create liquidity on DEXs and invest in the first 100 projects listed on AntSale, with each project receiving an investment of 20-50 SOL. All tokens obtained from these investments will be airdropped back to users who stake ANTF for at least 30 days.

open.title: Everyone is welcome
open.content-1: No whitelists or hoops to jump through, just use with your wallets and start fund raising or investing.
open.content-2: Soon users will also be able to create their first wallet when signing up, without any added complexities.

multi-chain.title: Bring your own socials
multi-chain.content-1: Connect your Lens Protocol and CyberConnect accounts to take your posting and following on-chain.
multi-chain.content-2: Everything in your wallets can be used as a building block of your own social graph.

multi-gamingfy.title: Build up your Cred
multi-gamingfy.content-1: Connect your Web3 collectibles, badges and credentials and build up your credibility to level up and receive unique perks!

reward.title: Get rewarded fairly
reward.content-1: Gamified and farming-resistant reward mechanisms ensure the right people earn Phaver Points and future token rewards for their contributions.

roadmap.title: Take a peek at our Roadmap
roadmap.description: Learn more about the future plans, Solana’s economy and AntSale's vision for more ethical social media
